participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and supportive, always willing to lend an ear to friends in need.
participant_1.background: I hate my parents, but I love my job. I train horses for a living. I write in my spare time. I wish I knew where I belonged.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, often overthinking situations and seeking validation from others.
participant_2.background: I am married. I am in school. I love the beach. I work 2 jobs. My favorite color is blue.

content.text: I'm sorry to hear that you hate your parents. I'm sure they love you very much, even if they don't always show it in the best way.
I don't know about that. They've never really been there for me.
Well, I'm here for you. I'm your friend.
Do you want to talk about it?
Sure. I don't really have anyone else to talk to.
Well, it's just that they're always fighting. They never get along. It's like they hate each other.
That must be really hard for you to see.
It is. I don't know what to do.
Well, I don't know the whole situation, but I can tell you that it's not your fault. They're the adults, and they're the ones who need to work things out.
I know. I just wish they would.
I'm sure they will eventually. In the meantime, you know you always have me to talk to.
Thanks, I know. I appreciate it.
